title: Jade Jones on dating, distraction and winning at the Youth Olympic Games
description:
Double Olympic champion Jade Jones is 25 and aiming for a third title at Tokyo 2020. She's travelled to Argentina as an athlete role model to give advice to those competing. With that in mind, we fired some difficult questions about dating and being an athlete. How do you get that balance between your love life and elite sport?


Plus, we have the latest headlines from Buenos Aires 2018 and the day's athlete to watch.
